product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaTrace'd Out Pencil Lip Liner
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeFinally, your ultimate lip liner has arrived. FENTY BEAUTY's Trace'd Out Pencil Lip Liner is a longwear, creamy pencil is made with pure pigments -- laying down true-cast color that won't look ashy and lasts up to 8 hours. The unique lineup of shades is made for every lip tone and makeup mood.
details: DetailsBenefitsLasts up to 8 hours + extends lipstick wearVelvet-matte finish made with pure pigmentsTrue-cast, creamy color for lips of all tonesNo-drag, blendable applicationResists transfer, feathering + fadingSharpenable for precise applicationItem 2625823How To UseTrace the outline of your lips with the precision tip.Lay the liner on its side to fill in your lips.Press your lips together to set in place.To keep liner fresh, make sure to push down on the cap tightly when you're done applying.IngredientsDimethicone, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyisobutene, Polyethylene, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Ozokerite, Acrylates/Stearyl Acrylate/Dimethicone Methacrylate Copolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Propylene Carbonate. May Contain [+/-] : Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 6 (CI 15850).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Trace the outline of your lips with the precision tip.Lay the liner on its side to fill in your lips.Press your lips together to set in place.To keep liner fresh, make sure to push down on the cap tightly when you're done applying.
ingredients: Propylene Carbonate. May Contain [+/-] : Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: I like it but it dont stay sharpened and its hard to sharpen
reviews.comments: Hard to sharpen...uses up pencil fast...just bought it

reviews.headline: my go-to lip combo!
reviews.comments: I love love LOVE this formula! Very creamy and a little goes a long way.  I have been pairing the shade Extra Thigh with the Fenty Gloss Bomb Oil in the shade Miss Jellyfish .. instant confidence booster.  It's just too good! I will definitely be stocking up on both products!

reviews.headline: To creamy
reviews.comments: Broke as soon as I put it on to creamy and was hard to get off

reviews.headline: extra thigh is that girl
reviews.comments: i use extra thigh with gloss stix blazd donut everyday. its the perfect brownie pale pink ombre nude and gives bratz doll lips! extra thigh is a hazelnut brown and paired with a cool toned pink is sooooo cute and sultry at the same time it makes the lips look so pouty and huge. its that 90s nude and just chefs kiss. the formula is very creamy and spreads well without being messy, it sets and it wont budge, its so longwearing and its worth it also its more affordable than some other highend liners. ive tried them all from mac, ct, chanel, dior etc and the fenty is my favorite

reviews.headline: Perfect nude color
reviews.comments: This lip liner is creamy and stays on all day, it doesn't look dry and you can also add lip gloss and maintains its true color.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: Im a bridal makeup artist and these are the only pencils i keep in my kit. They are so smooth and glide on so easily but last for a super longtime, which is important on a wedding day

reviews.headline: Pencil dried up so fast
reviews.comments: I wasnt able to use it after 3 months. It woukdve even line my lips because of how dry it got. I sharpened it snd everybting still wont budge

reviews.headline: I keep buying it.
reviews.comments: Love it! It stays on and makes mu lips pop.

reviews.headline: Love the color, very difficult to sharpen
reviews.comments: The formula is wonderful! I swatched it on my wrist and once it tried it didn't crack or bleed or rub off all day. The color They So Vine is the perfect cross between plum and dark cherry that I've been looking for. It is a very soft pencil so you have to be very gentle while applying. My only complaint is that sharpening it is VERY difficult because it seems like the pencil is plastic. I debated whether to return it because I love it otherwise and I might just accept that flaw and keep it.

reviews.headline: Finally
reviews.comments: I have tried every lipstain, liner, product and nothing stays on my lips. I research products and look at recommendations prior to purchasing items. I did not see reviews about this liner and purchased it after trying it on in the store. I love it!

reviews.headline: New Fav!!!
reviews.comments: This lip liner lasts all day long without drying out my lips. RiRi is the prettiest mauve - a must in my daily makeup routine!!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again and again
reviews.comments: 10000000000/10!!!!! The glide, the packaging and hydration are everything!!!!

reviews.headline: Lip Liner Magic
reviews.comments: The glide is perfection! I don't know what Rih did, but it eats so badddddd!!!! I love the formula. It's literal magic in pencil form. Amazing!

reviews.headline: Products wasted & breaks off easily
reviews.comments: I love the color of this liner. However, it needs to be CONSTANTLY sharpened because the liner breaks off so easily and is too soft. The cap also doesn't stay on at all so avoid carrying it around if you need touch ups. Not worth the money. I went through this so fast and barely used it

reviews.headline: It is very smooth in the lips and applies really good
reviews.comments: It is really good and one of the best lip liners I've used and it goes on really fast and stays on for a while so I do recommend this lip liner I would buy more !

reviews.headline: It's my favorite lip liner
reviews.comments: I got the I woodnt lip liner and it's absolutely GREAT! The best lip liner I own now and its the beat brown lip color ever!!! Try any lip liner out of her collection you won't regret it.

reviews.headline: My lips found their perfect match
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lip liner! It glides on so smoothly with zero tugging, and the application feels effortless. The color is just right for my complexion...natural, flattering, and versatile enough to wear alone or paired with lipstick. It gives my lips a polished, defined look without feeling heavy or dry. Definitely a new staple in my makeup routine!

reviews.headline: I will always purchase this
reviews.comments: Love, love love- such a fun color. I love brown and nude shades very creamy. Easy to apply and stays on.

reviews.headline: do better rihanna!
reviews.comments: i never make reviews but this liner breaks so easily! i always have to sharpen it every time i use it and all of the fenty products that i've used worked well except for this one...very creamy and a nice shade but it breaks apart awfully. it would be better if it was more sharpenable.

reviews.headline: Highly Recommended
reviews.comments: Lighter than expected but so soft

media.headline: I would buy this product over and over!
Love these lip liners! I'm getting more colors.
media.caption: Trace'd Out "Coalblooded" & LipBar matte lipstick "Bawse Lady"

faceoff_positive.comments: I picked the red shade and I'm so glad I did. For context, I have a medium complexion with a neutral/olive undertone. Rihanna is the reason I jumped into wearing red lipstick back in 2012. She came out with RiRi Woo with Mac and I was hooked. I've also bought her Stunna lip paint and had an obsession with that as well. It's a specific red that I like. It has to have a blue base and she knows how to do it for me. So when I finally got the package and saw it was Fenty I already knew it was going to be for me. The color is BEAUTIFUL. That vivid blue red. When applied it dries down to a powder smudge, kiss proof finish. It's not going anywhere and lasts through out the day. I only wish it was in pencil form as I hate these type of liners. I can never for the life of me get it as sharp as a pencil. It's also a little too soft for my liking. I have to be very light handed when applying because it feels like it will break easily. This will probably be the only color I'll try for those reasons. Had I not received this for free, I would've absolutely bought this color. It's one of my All time favorite reds.
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS COLOR!!!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I really do like it but there are somethings one must keep in mind: 1- It glides on the lips beautifully with no pulling or tugging but at the same time it glides so smooth I find that the formula is almost too soft. You have to apply with light pressure or you can see the tip lean (2) I love it is in a plastic packaging but when it is time to sharpen the plastic gives just a little resistance (3) when sharpening you can never get the tip back to original point. You can still use it but the point doesnt look as "pretty". I'm using an elf sharper and it doesn't sharpen well. I'm sharpening too much to try to get an even point. Im going to research to see if the Fenty sharpener is truly made for it. If I want it I have purchase on Fenty website 

I have I Woodn't and Brown'd Out and i love the colors. The liner actually sets itself so blend quickly after applying. It has staying power but not to the point of lasting all day or last after eating. You still will have to  reapply. 

I like the product but if I can solve  the sharpening issue I would love it.
faceoff_negative.headline: It is good butâ€¦.
